summary: A girl. A boy. A love story. But also about dreams, fears, life, true love, friendship and how we deal with it. And a secret between them...
cast: Ana de Armas|Martiño Rivas|Marina Salas|Megan Montaner|Andrea Duro|Jan Cornet|Richard Sahagún|Mario Pardo|Joel Bosqued|Alejandra Onieva|Nagore Cenizo|Candela Montesinos|Esperanza De la Vega|Nidia Moros|Luis Jaspe|Alejandra Chen Jiang|Carlota Ferrer|Michel Alejandro|Cristina Domínguez|María Domínguez|Marta García|Alejandro Garrido|Alejandro Guevara|Antonio Leyva|Kristine Lindmark|Elisa Tulian|Marcos Zhang|Koldo Olabarri
title: Por un puñado de besos
